ayahs.indonesian: Demi kuda perang yang berlari kencang terengah-engah,
dan kuda yang memercikkan bunga api (dengan pukulan kuku kakinya),
ayahs.english: And the producers of sparks [when] striking

ayahs.indonesian: dan kuda yang menyerang dengan tiba-tiba di waktu pagi,
lalu menyerbu ke tengah-tengah kumpulan musuh,
ayahs.english: Arriving thereby in the center collectively,

ayahs.indonesian: Sungguh, manusia itu sangat ingkar kepada Tuhannya,
ayahs.english: Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful.
And indeed, he is to that a witness.

ayahs.indonesian: dan sesungguhnya dia sangat mencintai harta benda.
ayahs.english: And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense.

ayahs.arabic: أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِي الْقُبُورِ
ayahs.transliteration: Afala ya'lamu iza bu'thira ma fil qubur
ayahs.indonesian: Maka tidakkah dia mengetahui apabila apa yang di dalam kubur dikeluarkan,
ayahs.english: But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered

ayahs.indonesian: dan apa yang tersimpan di dalam dada dilahirkan,
ayahs.english: And that within the breasts is obtained,

ayahs.indonesian: sungguh, Tuhan mereka pada hari itu Maha Teliti terhadap keadaan mereka.
ayahs.english: Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is [fully] Acquainted.
